text: Hi, I have a custom template for the Blog listing with several custom modules included, how can I edit the custom module fields in HubSpot? The blog page isn't like a normal Webpage with the page editor in Website section of HubSpot..
<@UBKP9GNBH> need to edit the module options on the template level for the blog listing template

How can I add more than one rich text module into the html coded template?

I have added 3 in different selections on this email but when I load it and use the template it only shows one and duplicates the text in each one.
Do I use the widget blocks??
your name attribute for them all match(educated guess without seeing code)
thus that’s causing those issues
change that attribute and you will solve the problem
if you post the HubL code of one of your rich text fields I can point out what needs to be changed
yep
which text do i change?
simple_text_field??
see where it says “simple_text_field” that’s the variable name that the field is storing to, since you have both set to the same thing
```{% text "make this unique" label="Month", value="This is the default value for this text field" %} ```
they both edit the same value and will print the same thing to the screen
AWESOME!! Thank you!!
in my head, <@U7SL518D6>’s “yep” sounded like my mechanic
“yep, those brakes are shot”
“yep, you’re gonna need a new carburetor Dennis”
exactly
substitute Dennis for son
or boy

*shudder* I had a doctor when I was a kid that always referred to me as “boy” in hindsight I think he did that so he didn’t have to look at the charts to see who he was working with. But I remember finding it annoying
